title: Matchsafe
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: A rectangle matchsafe in a dark brown color with rounded corners. One side says "Rubber and Cotton The Cutta Percha & Rubber MFG. co. 126 Duane St. New York Randolf St. Chicago". The reverse side has a cross and says "Fire Hose hose belting packing vaulves & co."

exhibitions.title: Faster, Cheaper, Newer, More: The Revolutions of 1848

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe.
Overall: 7.6 x 3 cm (3 x 1 3/16 in.). Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1980-14-530.
